vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.14.13;
brother of: Mamre (H4471H) and Aner (H6063)
§ Aner = "boy"
n pr m
1) one of the Amorite chiefs who aided Abraham in the pursuit of the 4 invading kings
n pr loc
2) a Levitical city west of the Jordan in Manasseh allotted to the Kohathite Levites
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   amorreo; (b)   ciudad; para los levitas; territorio de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞乃 这个字在原文的意思是 "男孩"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 亞摩利人首領之一, 曾幫助亞伯拉罕追捕4個侵略羅得的王
專有名詞 地名
2) 哥轄利未族在瑪拿西支派中所得的城市, 在約旦的西邊 #代上 6:70|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚乃 这个字在原文的意思是 "男孩"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 亚摩利人首领之一, 曾帮助亚伯拉罕追捕4个侵略罗得的王
专有名词 地名
2) 哥辖利未族在玛拿西支派中所得的城市, 在约旦的西边 #代上 6:70|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of ta.a.nakh (תַּעֲנָךְ "Taanach" H8590)
§ Aner = "boy"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) one of the Amorite chiefs who aided Abraham in the pursuit of the 4 invading kings
n pr loc
2) a Levitical city west of the Jordan in Manasseh allotted to the Kohathite Levites
